summary: This is an email forwarding official notification from the warden regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody. It indicates an ongoing investigation and promises further updates.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the notification; his death in custody is being reported.

persons.name: Supervisory Staff Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the original email, forwarding the official notification from the warden.

events.title: Notification of Epstein's Death
events.description: Official notification from the warden is forwarded regarding Jeffrey Epstein's passing while in custody.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein died while in federal custody (reg. no. 76318-054).
An official notification from the warden regarding his death was circulated on August 10, 2019.
The investigation into his death was stated to be ongoing at the time of the email.
The correspondence originated from a Supervisory Staff Attorney at CLC New York.
